Did you know that there has been a successful trial for an Alzheimer's vaccine? Or that researchers are discovering new ways in which the brain can 'rewire' itself to cope with pain? This cool infographic touches on some of the latest scientific developments that further our understanding of the mind's inner workings. Check it out.
